title: Engineering Practices Maturity Assessment
description: Evaluate your organization's engineering practices maturity across five key stages: Normalization, Standardization, Expansion, Automation, and Self-Service.

sections.title: Normalization Practices
sections.description: Foundation: Establishing consistent basic practices across teams

questions.text: How mature is your version control system?
questions.helpText: Consider branching strategies, code review processes, and automation.

questions.text: How well-established are your development guidelines?
questions.helpText: Think about coding standards, code review processes, and documentation practices.

questions.text: How consistent are your development tools and environments?
questions.helpText: Consider development environment setup, tooling consistency, and environment management.

sections.title: Standardization Practices
sections.description: Consistency: Creating reusable patterns and golden paths

questions.text: How well-defined are your golden paths for common workflows?
questions.helpText: Think about standardized workflows for new projects, deployments, and common development tasks.

questions.text: How mature is your Infrastructure as Code implementation?
questions.helpText: Consider declarative infrastructure, version control of infrastructure, and automated provisioning.

questions.text: How consistently do you use containerization across your applications?
questions.helpText: Think about Docker usage, container registries, and orchestration platforms.

sections.title: Expansion Practices
sections.description: Scaling: Enabling autonomous teams with end-to-end ownership

questions.text: How autonomous are your development teams?
questions.helpText: Consider team decision-making authority, cross-functional capabilities, and ownership scope.

questions.text: How mature is your continuous integration process?
questions.helpText: Think about automated testing, build automation, and quality gates.

questions.text: How comprehensive is your observability and feedback system?
questions.helpText: Consider monitoring, logging, tracing, and alerting capabilities.

sections.title: Automation Practices
sections.description: Intelligence: Implementing intelligent operations and self-healing systems

questions.text: How automated is your system configuration management?
questions.helpText: Think about configuration management, drift detection, and automated remediation.

questions.text: How automated is your resource provisioning?
questions.helpText: Consider auto-scaling, resource optimization, and cost management automation.

questions.text: How integrated is security throughout your development lifecycle?
questions.helpText: Think about security scanning, compliance automation, and vulnerability management.

sections.title: Self-Service Practices
sections.description: Platform: Enabling platform-driven development and citizen developers

questions.text: How mature is your self-service developer platform?
questions.helpText: Consider developer portals, self-service APIs, and platform automation.

questions.text: How effectively do you leverage low-code/no-code solutions?
questions.helpText: Think about business application development and citizen developer enablement.

questions.text: How data-driven is your golden path optimization?
questions.helpText: Consider how you collect feedback and continuously improve your development workflows.

recommendations.title: Focus on Foundation
recommendations.description: Your organization needs to establish basic engineering practices before advancing to higher maturity stages.
items: Establish development guidelines and code review processes

recommendations.title: Build Consistency
recommendations.description: You have solid foundations. Focus on creating reusable patterns and golden paths.
items: Develop golden paths for common workflows

recommendations.title: Scale with Autonomy
recommendations.description: Your standardization is good. Focus on enabling autonomous teams and end-to-end ownership.
items: Increase team autonomy and decision-making authority
Build robust observability and feedback systems
Enable teams with full stack capabilities

recommendations.title: Automate Operations
recommendations.description: Your teams are scaling well. Focus on intelligent automation and self-healing systems.
items: Integrate security throughout the development lifecycle
Create predictive analytics for system health

recommendations.title: Enable Self-Service
recommendations.description: You have excellent automation. Focus on platform-driven development and citizen developers.
items: Empower citizen developers with proper governance
